resources.string: You can also contact and find me in other social networks such as: Pinterest, Instagram, Path, GetGlue and Tumblr. Here is my skype username: penanochizzo.
These are the most important social networks I am using at the moment. Feel free to contact or follow.

Google Developer Groups (GDGs - ex GTUGs) are for developers who are interested in Google\'s developer technology; such as Android, App Engine, Google Chrome, etc. Here I am organizing and leading different developers events around Barcelona.

Creator of the android app based on NFC Technology. This application lets you program an NFC tag to do “something”, such as send an email, open a url, checkin with foursquare, etc. Once your tag has a quick action “inside” it, you just get your android device close to it and that action is executed.
Creator of the android10 community (android10.org). This is an open community joined with common goals: to learn, to teach and to have fun with Google Android.

I was finalist at Barcelona AppCircus 2011 with the android application: NFC Quick Actions. This event is a unique global traveling showcase of the most creative and innovative apps presented by their creators during some of the most influential international events in mobile.

Genmob The Smartphone Day is a congress based on technology where you can find conferences, networking, showcases and a lot of stuff related with the mobile world. I had the chance to participate as speaker giving an Introduction to Android Development as a topic.

Bdigital Apps ia a congress specialised in mobile applications for developers and companies. It is organized by Barcelona Digital Technology Centre. In 2011 I had the chance to give a speech related with Android Push Notifications.
I am a person who leads by example rather than by dictate and I like to bring out the best in people, that\'s why I speak and help people and companies implement agile methodologies such as scrum.
I do like open source and I am a participant in communities. This is my masterbranch profile where you can check some of my open source project with their source code.
SlideShare is the best way to share presentations, documents and professional videos. Check out the material I use for events and speech.
Experienced in backend and mobile software development using languages such as Java and C# applying best practices and last technologies.
Help teams or individuals to adopt and improve agile methods and practice, making them rethink and change the way they go about development.

I had been working as a Software Architect for Aifos Solutions, an RFID Company where I developed some products based on RFID technology. Also I worked for a mobile company doing android stuff for Bank and Financial Entities and coaching the development Team using agile methologies. At fastDove (Push Notifications Company), I was the CTO, taking the responsability of establishing the Company\’s Technical Vision.
Now a days I am working as CTO at Mobile Development Software Company and organizing the Google Developers Group (GDG) in Barcelona.
